author: peter.davies
content: <@!415548822983278593> Proportional slashing penalties: if you get slashed, you lose 3s/D of your deposit, where s is the total ETH of other validators that got slashed in the time period between 2 eeks before you were slashed and 2 eeks after you are slashed, and D is total deposits. For example, if there is 10 million ETH staking, you get slashed, and 300,000 ETH worth of validators got slashed within 2 eeks of you, you lose 9% of your deposit (this is in addition to the fixed 1/32 minimum penalty).
